title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 451/85 of 21 February 1985 amending for the 24th time Regulation (EEC) No 2730/81 establishing a list of agencies in non-member importing countries entitled to issue invitations to tender in the milk and milk products sector
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 451/85
of 21 February 1985
amending for the 24th time Regulation (EEC) No 2730/81 establishing a list of agencies in non-member importing countries entitled to issue invitations to tender in the milk and milk products sector
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body:
In the Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 2730/81, the list of issuing organizations should be completed by addition of the following organization, insertion being made in the alphabetical order of the importing country:
1.2 // Importing country  // Issuing organization  // Jordan  // Civil Service Consumer Corporation PO box 9706 Amman Jordan

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 21 February 1985.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 148, 28. 6. 1968, p. 13.
(2) OJ No L 150, 6. 6. 1984, p. 6.
(3) OJ No L 272, 26. 9. 1981, p. 25.
(4) OJ No L 261, 2. 10. 1984, p. 8.
